entry.title: After Almost
entry.summary:
Author: she_mammoth

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,517Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: Derek stops it before it gets out of hand. Stiles is seventeen, too young, far too reckless, and Derek is terrified of crossing a line he can never uncross. He tells himself it's the right thing to do. Stiles will find someone his own age. He deserves that, someone uncomplicated. Derek never imagined that someone would be his son.

entry.title: Yellow Paper Daisy
entry.summary:
Author: Babysterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,775Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 25

Summary: “Well,” Peter says at last, forcing a crooked smile into his voice, “at least this time he didn’t almost get us all killed.”Derek swallows. His throat is dry, the words scraping on the way out. “I was drunk.” They land and disappear without effect. Talia turns then, her gaze settling on him fully. It’s steady, unreadable, and it makes his shoulders tense despite himself. “You were careless,” she says. Not angry. Not loud. Certain. “You are a werewolf, and if you got drunk, you laced it with wolfsbane, you did it. Do you understand, In twenty-four years, every scandal has had the same root. You. At some point, it stops being bad luck and becomes character. And I am tired of pretending this is something that merely happens to you.” Derek nods once, reflexive. “When you speak,” Talia continues, “you do so as a Hale. As Alpha blood. Your indulgences do not absolve you of that.” ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Derek just wanted a moment of quiet. Instead, he crosses a line with the last person he should trust.....old grudges, bad decisions, and a mistake he keeps repeating.

entry.title: Moonless Night
entry.summary:
Author: all-or-nothing-baby (BundleOfSoy)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,680Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 48

Summary: [Friday] oh shit Derek I've just realised I'm Bella fuckign swan 7:21 OR Derek leaves Beacon Hills for a second time to become a veritable ghost and track down rogue hunters, leaving Stiles to contemplate exactly what he's lost. Attempting to work through his feelings as best he can, Stiles continues to text his favourite sourwolf, regardless of the lack of reciprocation. So when Theo infiltrates the pack—and no one is paying any heed to Stiles's spidey sense tingling like a motherfucker—Stiles sending messages to the possibly defunct text thread of the one person he can truly rely on becomes his only form of solace.

entry.title: Ravensholme
entry.summary:
Author: VermillionQ

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 336,556Chapters: 44/?Kudos: 206

Summary: The Verse, as it is known, exists in a state of anarchy, with hundreds of billions of worlds and species, where marvels of magic and technology abound, and more often than not, you are likely to live in poverty and fear. Thousands of factions vie for dominance, resources, power. Great empires that span hundred of systems are dwarfed by even greater corpocratic states who themselves are dwarfed by religious movements. In a small corner of the Milky Way, Claudia Stilinski set out to make her faction the greatest...and she did. When Claudia, the leader of Ravensholme, passes away unexpectedly it leaves her teenage son Stiles alone except for a father in Beacon Hills whom he has never truly known. Stiles is forced to remain on Earth as the Ravensholme Triumvirate seeks to keep the borders of their growing dominion safe from their rivals, while watching over their beloved leader's son until he comes of age. Stiles, filled with rage and despair at his mother's death, is forced to move to Beacon Hills, California, cut off from his friends, and heartsick. He is forced to reckon with his own trauma and contend with being a teenager and heir to what many call The Verse's one true hope to creating a better life for all.

entry.title: Change On The Rise
entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 109,394Chapters: 64/75Kudos: 71

Summary: (Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU continuation)As summer draws to a close, the Littlefield pack continues their long road to recovery. Still reeling from his sister's death and resurrection, Derek returns to his quest for the truth of his lost Hale ancestor; Cora grapples with the consequences of everything that transpired over the summer, including her return from the dead; and Stiles finds new ways to balance the desires of his inner demons with the needs of his pack.

entry.title: Full Moons and Family Drama
entry.summary:
Author: thenerdyindividual

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,792Chapters: 5/6Kudos: 257

Summary: Talia Hale survives the Hale Fire, along with Laura, Derek, Peter, and Cora. It's been roughly ten years since the events of that night, and to say that it left scars would be an understatement. Desperate to bring her Pack back to its old strength, Talia will not stop pushing her children and brother to settle down and have kids of their own. For this year's Cold Moon, Peter finally brings someone home. Stiles is not at all what Talia was expecting. He's far too young for Peter, he's human, and worst of all a man. (No biological children to carry on the Pack). He also doesn't give a shit what Talia says about him. His mere presence is enough to have her melting down, and it's bad for the simmering tension between her and the rest of the Pack. Unfortunately, everyone else likes him. Derek might like him more than the rest. A little too much. Aw hell, he has a crush on his uncle's boyfriend. Or: Five times Peter brought Stiles to a Full Moon Run + One time Derek did. (Updates every other Tuesday)

entry.title: Mates, Magic and Mischief
entry.summary:
Author: stereksterek

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,309Chapters: 5/6Kudos: 72

Summary: The Alpha looked confused and concerned all at the same time, so taking an educated guess, Stiles ventured a theory. “Oh great. Let me guess… We’re lost aren’t we?” Derek growled at the insult and continued to scan the trees, rocks and stumps around them. “We’re not lost, Stiles. The landscape has… changed.” “Changed?” Stiles repeated in disbelief, before intentionally wandering in front of the werewolf to block his view. “As in, the trees just grew legs and walked away?” ___ Or, 5 times magic messed with Derek and Stiles, and the 1 time it got it right...

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 113,444Chapters: 21/23Kudos: 170

Summary: He thought he could outrun his past. After a shootout leaves his gang scattered and the law on his heels, Derek slips into another man’s life—marriage offer and all. But he didn’t expect Stiles: clever, stubborn, and heartbreakingly sincere. And when the past catches up, Derek will have to choose what kind of man he really is—the one he left behind, or the one he’s pretending to be. Marriage was part of the plan. Falling in love wasn’t.

entry.title: Let Me Lay Waste to Thee
entry.summary:
Author: extrasourwolf

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,689Chapters: 8/8Kudos: 83

Summary: The town of Beacon Hills generally avoids the old Hale Manor. It’s surrounded by a forest of tall trees, winds that can’t possibly be anything but supernatural, and a foreboding sense of doom. The townspeople like to tell their children stories about it, like to tell them that if they listen closely enough, they can hear the beast howling in the night, looking for prey.Stiles would like to inform them, however, that he’s probably just howling because Finstock decided that spicy soup was the way to go and spicy for Finstock is “ow-you-fucking-teapot-are-you-trying-to-kill-me?!” for normal people (or normal beasts– semantics, semantics).

entry.title: Latibule
entry.summary:
Author: Deanslefttoe

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,995Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 48

Summary: Latibule: (noun.) A hiding place; a place or person of safety and comfort Stiles is at college, in his second year of study, trying to navigate being a broke student, being away from his home town, and being kicked out of his pack.Stiles is prepared, feeling less off balance than his previous year at college, he's excited, even, ready to get through as much as possible. And, he is almost over the guilt and shame and heartbreak that came with the whole getting kicked out of his pack thing. Yes, he still has a crush on Derek, but he has had a crush on Derek since he was 16, and now at 21, he's pretty sure he can manage.What happens when Stiles's new Folklore & Anthropology professor turns out to be Derek Hale, the one who kicked him from the pack 2 years earlier? What happens when Stiles is so utterly convinced that Derek hates him that he can't read between the lines of what the werewolf is trying to tell him?Read to find out ;)
